title: So... how does Armour Penetration/Reduction work right now?
body:
Since Last Whisper was changed quite dramatically in the new season I was wondering how Armour is now calculated?

I'm assuming it goes something like:

Armour Reduction (%)
Armour Reduction (Flat)
Bonus Armour Penetration (%)
Armour Penetration (%)
Armour Penetration (Flat)

I mean you can't get Armour Penetration (%) from items any more, but there's still a couple champions out there with it as passives, or on abilities (ie. Darius). But if the order is something like what I've described above, doesn't that mean that Armour Reduction is skewing the effectiveness of the new Bonus Armour Penetration? Since once reduced, there's less bonus armour to cut through compared to the Champion's base value.

Just something I've been pondering any help is appreciated :)
